personal.name: Kiruthika Kuppusaamy
personal.title: Assistant Professor
personal.tagline: Empowering students through technology education and innovation

about.biography: I began my career as a School Teacher at Jaycees Matriculation Higher Secondary School, Erode. My journey in higher education started when I stepped in as a Lecturer at Muthayammal College of Arts and Science, Rasipuram, where I worked for two years. I then continued my service at K.S. Rangasamy College of Arts and Science, Tiruchengode – a golden period in my career that gave me immense exposure to the teaching field. I had the privilege of working there for nearly 10 years. Later, I served at Vellalar College for Women (Autonomous), Erode for six years. This is the place where I found the spark to create this blog and began posting videos to share knowledge with a wider audience. My journey then took me back to K.S. Rangasamy College of Technology, Tiruchengode, where I worked as a Technical Trainer in the Training and Placement Department. Currently, I am working as an Assistant Professor in the MCA Department at K.S. Rangasamy College of Technology.
about.mission: This blog is my humble attempt to share the knowledge and experiences I've gathered over the years, and to provide insights into the subjects I have learned – from my own perspective.

professionalJourney.description: Leading master's level courses in computer applications and guiding research initiatives
Prepared students for industry readiness through comprehensive technical training programs
Taught undergraduate and postgraduate computer science courses. Spark to create educational content.
